name: combojs
description: A combobox for intelligent, responsive search and filtering.
author: Asger Hallas

scripts.clean: npm run clean:tests& npm run clean:lib
scripts.compile:lib: start npm run compile:stylus:lib& start npm run compile:coffee:lib
scripts.compile: timeout 1& npm run compile:lib&npm run compile:tests
scripts.watch:lib: start npm run watch:stylus:lib& start npm run watch:coffee:lib
scripts.watch: timeout 1& npm run watch:lib&npm run watch:tests
scripts.fails:watch:lib: start npm run compile:stylus:lib& start npm run compile:coffee:lib
scripts.test:chrome: title nightwatch& nightwatch --config ./tests/nightwatch.json -s regression_fails -o ./tests/results/reports/chrome/ -e chrome -g sanity
scripts.test:ie: title nightwatch& nightwatch --config ./tests/nightwatch.json -s regression_fails -o ./tests/results/reports/ie/ -e ie -g sanity
scripts.test:firefox: title nightwatch& nightwatch --config  ./tests/nightwatch.json -s regression_fails -o ./tests/results/reports/firefox/ -e firefox -g sanity
scripts.report: npm run report:chrome& npm run report:ie& npm run report:firefox
scripts.pretest: npm run clean & npm run compile& timeout 1
scripts.test: npm run test:chrome& npm run test:ie& npm run test:firefox& npm run report
scripts.start: npm run clean & npm run watch& timeout 2& start ./tests/index.html
